articles.author: Thomas Biesheuvel
articles.title: Anglo Won't Extend BHP Deadline, Threatening End to Takeover Bid - Bloomberg
articles.description: Anglo American Plc said it won’t give BHP Group any further time to commit to a takeover offer, threatening to end a $49 billion pursuit by the world’s biggest mining company.
articles.content:
